https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6DhrAK7K7LPnsZxL40M6cLhQZgh.jpg Explores U.S. Special Forces role in the massacre of about 3,000 unarmed Taliban prisoners of war in Afghanistan from the battle of Mazar-e-Sharif by Northern Alliance soldiers. Afghan Massacre: The Convoy of Death
